title: AI Chains: Building composable AI tools quickly
author: A. Dev
excerpt: A practical guide to composing small AI utilities into powerful workflows.
html: Composable AI is a pattern where you stitch together small, specialized models or actions into a chain. This lets you optimize each step and reuse modules across tasks.

title: Top Dev Tools in 2025: What to watch
author: DevOps Daily

html: From local-first dev sandboxes to AI-assisted code completion, these tools reshape developer workflows.

title: Crypto and Personal Finance: Basics you should know

html: Understand risk-adjusted returns, stablecoins, and how to use dollar-cost averaging responsibly.

title: YouTube Trends: 5 content ideas that are exploding

title: Reddit's Rising Topics This Week

title: Microlearning: Small lessons, big impact
author: EduBytes
excerpt: How to structure micro-lessons for modern learners and retention.
html: Microlearning uses tight scopes and active recall to help learners keep pace with rapidly changing knowledge.
